features.featureTitle: Store the 4 newly uploaded book cover photos as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated/ with the following filenames: BOOK (1).jpeg → book-cover-01.jpeg (गंगा की वाणी), BOOK (2).jpeg → book-cover-02.jpeg (मन के मोती), BOOK (3).jpeg → book-cover-03.jpeg (श्री कृष्ण दर्शन), BOOK (4).jpeg → book-cover-04.jpeg (वृद्धाश्रम). These replace any existing book cover files.

Update the 'Books by Our Founder' sub-section on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) to display 4 book cards: book-cover-01.jpeg labeled 'गंगा की वाणी', book-cover-02.jpeg labeled 'मन के मोती', book-cover-03.jpeg labeled 'श्री कृष्ण दर्शन', and book-cover-04.jpeg labeled 'वृद्धाश्रम'. Replace the existing 3-book layout with this 4-book layout.

Update the 'Books by Our Founder' sub-section on the About page (frontend/src/pages/About.tsx) to display 4 book cards: book-cover-01.jpeg labeled 'गंगा की वाणी', book-cover-02.jpeg labeled 'मन के मोती', book-cover-03.jpeg labeled 'श्री कृष्ण दर्शन', and book-cover-04.jpeg labeled 'वृद्धाश्रम'. Replace the existing 3-book layout with this 4-book layout.
